title: Game crashes in loading screen
body:
Well, since 14/8 my game crashes at loading screen.

I launch the client, open a (Custom or Ranked game) then to champion select{{champion:266}} 
I lock in, wait for sometime then the loading screen starts

* **The game crashes at loading screen**
I have good internet, My PC is far beyond the game req, updated Direct X, updated Nvidia drivers,  and I don't use any 3rd party programs
Sometimes the loading reaches 30% then crashes...
Any ideas how to fix this??

replies.body: It sounds like your game files are failing to render and causing you to crash, and not necessarily your connection.  Go over our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide for steps to resolve this, going through each instruction listed.  The guide will ask you to review your drivers, so double check them or if they're the correct ones.  Let me know if you still have any issues afterwards!
I already did every single step of these things before, nothing changes
